mutants.code:
def minimum_operations_to_build_temple(n, heights):
    sumi = sum(heights)
    prev = 2
    for i in range(n):
        heights[i] = min(heights[i], prev)
        prev = heights[i] + 1
    prev = 1
    for i in range(n - 1, -1, -1):
        heights[i] = min(heights[i], prev)
        prev = heights[i] + 1
    temp = 0
    for i in range(n):
        temp = max(temp, heights[i])
    return sumi - temp * temp
